value.name: Names released in deadly officer-involved shooting in Jonesboro
value.description: JONESBORO, AR (KAIT) - The names of those involved in a deadly officer-involved shooting late Tuesday night have been released. Jonesboro police said in a statement the officer involved was ...

value.name: Prosecutor releases dashcam video of fatal officer-involved shooting, law professor weighs in
value.description: JONESBORO, AR (KAIT) - Exactly two weeks after an officer-involved shooting that left a Jonesboro man dead, prosecutors have released dashcam video of that fateful night. Christopher Grant Finley ...
